comments.comment: The approach to solve this issue is to glob paths using FileStatus[] org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem.globStatus(Path pathPattern, PathFilter filter) throws IOException for input paths.

Few minor comments:

  • Please add javadoc for getGlobPaths method.
  • pathString -> commaSeparatedPaths
  • notfound -> not found
